attributes.title: 2018 Nissan Almera 1.5 Acenta Auto

attributes.description:
The new X-Trail improves on the previous generation's formula. It rides comfortably, is spacious and practical, and can cope with a bit of rough terrain thrown its direction. The X-Trail is a good choice of SUV for the family that wants a bit of everything.
The 2-litre petrol has a 106 kW and 200 Nm of torque and the manual six-speed gearbox is a light shifter and particularly easy to get in and out of gear.
The boot is quite large at 550-litres and with the seats folded down that increases to 1405-litres. They haven't skimped on safety and this X-Trail comes with ABS, traction control, airbags everywhere and hill start assist.
The Nissan X-Trail has an extremely comfortable ride, it's cushioned over bumps and soaks up dirt roads with aplomb. The X-Trail's steering feels communicative and does a good job over the rougher stuff of being nice and light. On the road it's still nicely weighted and inspires confidence on freeways that you have total control. It's a family vehicle that's comfortable and capable.

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome
